Release Notes:
#37115 
Allows the Contractor Manager/BOM/Resource Coordinator to be aware of the companies currently in DRS and be able to update and maintain their profiles.

#37114 
Allows the Contractor Manager/BOM/Resource Coordinator to associate to a User in the already created User profile form, and create new users with a selection of roles.

#37123 
As a Contractor Manager, they need access to enter Disposal Sites so it is available on the load ticket.

#37124 
As a Contractor Manager, they need a place to access the Create Disposal Site function and view/edit all existing Disposal Sites so I can maintain the Disposal Site profile.

#37117 
As a Contractor Manager/BOM/Resource Coordinator, they need to reflect changes to the User Profile for the Company and address information so that they can select a company on the user profile instead of manually entering it.

#37132 
As the BOM/Resource Coordinator/COR3 Approver/Contractor Manager, they need access to review the truck certification so they can review/monitor the work being completed.

#37247 
As the BOM/Resource Coordinator/COR3 Approver/Contractor Manager, they need access to review the trucks flagged for recertification so they can determine what is needed in the field.

#37879 

As a BOM/Resource Coordinator/COR3 Approver/Contractor Manager/Document Specialist, they want access to view the load tickets ingested from the APP so that they can validate the work completed in the field.


#38677 

This story is just to add the new items to the document tree.  The QA/QC team verified that the items are visible on the document tree based type and class.

#38583 

This story was used to add the fields categorized as new or verify the existing are already on the site profile.

#38584 
These roles are needed to complete the project execution process.  This story is meant to create the roles and the functionality for each role was completed as the project execution stories were implemented.

#37223 
As the BOM/Resource Coordinator/COR3 Approver/Contractor Manager, they need access to review all versions of the truck certification/recertification process so they can monitor the work being completed.

#37242 
As the BOM/Resource Coordinator/ Contractor Manager, they need access to this section to review all the Execution work completed in the field so they can review/monitor the work being completed.

#37129 
As the BOM/Resource Coordinator/Contractor Manager, they need access to this section to review all the implementation work completed in the field so they can review/monitor the work being completed.

#37121 

As a Contractor Manager, they want to enter the information when creating and editing a contractor so that they are available in the system.


#37116 
As a Contractor Manager/BOM/Resource Coordinator, they want to edit company profiles so that they can maintain and update companies profile.

#37125 
As Contractor Manager, they need a place to access and edit disposal sites so they can maintain the disposal profile.
